analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.claimCofounditTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#414-426):
	External calls:
	- token.mintTokens(cofounditColdStorage,cofounditReward) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#425)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cofounditHasClaimedTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#425-426)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.claimCoreTeamsTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#401-414):
	External calls:
	- devReward = maxTokenSupply - token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#406-409)
	- token.mintTokens(_to,devReward) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#411)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ownerHasClaimedTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#412)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.processTransaction (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#263-293):
	External calls:
	- token.mintTokens(_contributor,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#286-290)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorList (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#290-292)

Crowdsale.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#320-327) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20Token(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x6f0d792b540afa2c8772b9ba4805e7436ad8413e.sol#325-327)
